name.baseName: Plastic packaging boxes and containers ; Resin, auxiliaries ; Blending-mixing-extrusion/injection (blow) molding ; All sizes; NESPS2
塑料包装箱及容器 ; 树脂、助剂 ; 配料-混合-挤出/注（吹）塑 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is Annual actual operating hours of desulfurization facilities / annual actual operating hours of units

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is Annual actual operating hours of desulfurization facilities / annual actual operating hours of units
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集涉及用于生产塑料包装箱和容器的塑料，包括适用于所有尺寸的混合、搅拌和各种成型技术。数据还描述了在生产过程中用于处理废气和挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）的各种末端治理技术。这些技术包括脱硫、活性炭吸附、低温等离子、再生热燃烧、光催化，以及这些技术的组合，用以提高治理污染的效率。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码29,四级代码2926文件，在完整版文件中第3308页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisRegenerative thermal combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is Annual actual operating hours of the dust removal facilities / annual actual operating hours of units
污染物指标挥发性有机物①的末端治理技术是蓄热式热力燃烧法，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/废气产污工段正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物①，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物①

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisLow temperature plasma + activated carbon adsorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is Take the minimum value of K for dust removal, denitration and desulfurization of the unit
污染物指标挥发性有机物①的末端治理技术是低温等离子体+活性炭吸附，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/废气产污工段正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物①，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物①

nan
